page.title: 18PRINCE ANDREW'S CHAPEL.
page.content: Claire goes to Prince Andrew's Chapel in Aldborough with her family. It plays a lively part in the village community.On Sundays there is a communion service at 10.30 followed by a family service.The younger chidren go out half-way though to a Sunday school.They have a work book with the days lesson in it.During the week there are various social activities-on Tuesday once a month is the Luncheon club at 11.00 until 1.00pm.Old and young people come for a roast dinner and sometimes go on outings.On Wednesdays there is Buzz Club for young children between 6pm and 7pm and at 7.30pm-9pm there is a senior club for 11-16 year olds.There is usually a Christmas party,an outing and once a year the children get a book for attending the Sunday School.
